neg review: I did not like the fact that there is no reception .

pos review: Excellent in check which was late evening. Very clean and tidy. Loads of room, with comfortable beds and good bathroom.
Very nice people who run the rooms and the hotel. Special thanks for the guy making the Pizza's in a traditional oven.
Alain the host was very accommodating and flexible. Nice restaurant bellow the hotel and really close to the track
neg review: Nothing. All good it says what it does on the tin. It's a nice room close to the track

pos review: Perfect location directly to the racing circuit
Nice place to stay while you expend the day out
